results.title: Her Views From Close Up Are on Everyone’s Radar
results.abstract: Lois Dodd, at 95, is finally getting her largest museum show yet at the newly expanded Bruce Museum in Greenwich, Conn.

results.title: ‘Life of Pi’ Review: A Boy and a Tiger, Burning Brightly
results.abstract: Human ingenuity and animal grace course through this rich, inventive play about difficult choices and the stories we tell to make sense of them.
